settings.description: Provide your friends with a 10% discount on their initial purchase from Surveillance. Upon your friend's successful purchase, you'll receive a 10% discount coupon as well. If you manage to refer 5 friends effectively, you'll be rewarded with a complimentary SmartThermostat Standard.

We understand the thrill of receiving complimentary items, and we're embracing that excitement. That's why we're extending a 10% discount coupon to any friends you introduce to us. When they make a purchase totaling $25 or more, you'll also benefit from a 10% discount. Once you successfully encourage five of your friends to make purchases on Electro Surveillance, we'll present you with a free camera!

Commencing this process is effortless. Simply utilize the referral form provided above. Enter your name and email, then decide how you'd like to distribute the discount or which friends you wish to share it with.

Numerous options await you. You can share on social media, send a text to your friends, or even use the classic method of sending an email. Choose whatever suits you best.

settings.heading: Every time you successfully refer a friend...Your friend gets a 10% off coupon + YOU get 10% off too!
Once you successfully refer 5 friends. You get a FREE LuminaView LV1547

settings.description: A successful referral is when a friend, new to Surveillance, makes any purchase on Surveillance using your unique referral link. This must be their first purchase that's over $25 on Surveillance to count as a referral.

settings.block_heading: How will I know if I have successfully referred someone?
settings.description: We will send you an email letting you know if someone you've referred has made a purchase on wyze.com and in that email will be a 10% off coupon for you. Once you have successfully referred 5 friends, a separate email with a coupon code for a free Camera will be sent your way.

settings.block_heading: How will you send me my free camera?
settings.description: We will send you an email with a coupon code worth the cost of the camera. You can use that coupon code to purchase a Wyze Cam OG or take credit off the price of anything else on Surveillance.

settings.block_heading: I don't want a Wyze Cam OG, can I get something else?
settings.description: Yes. You can put your coupon code towards any item on Surveillance.

settings.block_heading: If I refer 3 people, does that mean I get 30% off my order?
settings.description: No. Coupon codes do not stack. In this scenario, you will receive three separate 10% off coupons that you can use on separate orders. Each code is unique and only good for a single use.

settings.block_heading: I can't get this to work. Help!
settings.description: The most common reason for broken referrals are incorrect copying of the coupon code, referring someone you've already referred before, referring someone who is already a Surveillance customer, or by using a code twice. Those situations are not eligible for referral and the referral software will not grant your friend a code. If none of those things are an issue, please reach out to our Wizards Team at support@electro-surveillance.com.
